channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A “Narrow Recovery” in the Cards?
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Friday’s market gains might look bullish on the surface, but beneath it, market breadth tells a different story. Short-, medium...

item.title: Who’s Buying the Dip? (Pay Attention)
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Corporate insiders—executives and board members—are legally allowed to trade their own stock, and right now, they’re buying mor...

item.title: Fed Day Breadth Surge
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! The S&P 500 just posted its best Fed Day since July 2024, climbing 1.08% and fueling the breadth surge that kicked off last Fri...

item.title: When Uncertainty Peaks
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! AI mentions on S&P 500 earnings calls just spiked again. After plateauing for most of 2024, companies are ramping up discussion...
